categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname

nodes.text: The elfish humanoids were a sentient species that lived on a small planetoid. They were ruled by a king until he was murdered during the invasion by the Yahk-Tosh warlord Lord Gar-Oth. The king's daughter, Princess Lourdes, managed to kill the invader with the help of Jedi Knight Yoshi Raph-Elan.

Lourdes' species is not described in their initial appearance, Star Wars 27; however, in the issue of the The Official Star Wars Fact File that covered these events, she was described as an "elfish humanoid". Leland Chee, on the StarWars.com Message Boards, stated that his theory is that "all pointy-eared species are either Sephi or closely related to Sephi."
